body:
### Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.

As we are all know we often should write some helper or factory methods to convert some types in Cython, but we also should use then it with syntax like `MyType_from_OtherType(some_var)`. 
 
It would be cool to add special decorators or dunder methods to register custom function for types conversion, and then to be able to use much more readable `<OtherType>(some_Var)` syntax for that.

We already have definitions in generated code like
```C
__Pyx_PyFloat_AsDouble
// means
PyAPI_FUNC(double) PyFloat_AsDouble(PyObject*);
```
Which allows to us `<double>100`, so give us a possibility to customize it

### Describe the solution you'd like.

I would like to use something like that in Cython to define/declare factory functions to convert data between different types, especially between Python classes and C/C++ structs/classes 

```cython
cdef struct MyStruct:
    double a
    int b

cdef class MyClass:
    pass
    
@cython.convertor
cdef MyStruct MyClass_AsMyStruct(object my_obj):
    cdef MyStruct ret
    # There the conversion logic
    return ret

@cython.convertor
cdef object MyStruct_AsMyClass(MyStruct *my_struct):
    cdef object obj
    # There the conversion logic
    return obj
```   

Then It would be nice to convert between declared types with this syntax
```cython
cdef object my_obj = MyClass()
cdef MyStruct my_struct = <MyStruct>(my_obj)
cdef object my_obj2 = <MyClass>(&my_struct)
```

### Describe alternatives you've considered.

Other approach is allow to use special dunder methods but this can be less flexible than decorators, decorators should allow to register convertations for any types 
```cython
cdef class MyClass:

    cdef MyStruct __AsMyStruct(self):
        # There the conversion logic
        return MyStruct(...)

    @staticmethod
    cdef object __FromMyStruct(MyStruct *my_struct):
        # There the conversion logic
        return MyClass(...)
```

You can propose any other method to register custom types convertors, but using `<type>var` syntax looks much clear and readable and native for cython

title: [ENH] Allow register custom types convertion for `<type>var` syntax
